participant_1.background:
I traveled to Asia and Europe to learn new cooking techniques and share my food with new people.
I try to look my best when I go out, but I don't stress out about it too much.
i like anime shows.
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.
my favorite drink is dr pepper.

participant_2.background:
My weight is not something that I want to discuss.
My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things.
i like watching tv in my free time as well.
i work at a coffee house.
I am content with my solitary lifestyle and enjoy spending time with my pets.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you?
I'm doing great! I just got back from traveling the world. I learned a lot about different cultures and cuisines.
Wow, that sounds really amazing! I've always wanted to travel, but I'm not sure I'd be comfortable leaving my pets behind for so long.
I can understand that. I have a pet cat myself, and I'd be really sad to leave him for a long time.
Do you have any favorite anime shows? I love watching anime in my free time.
I love watching anime too! My favorite show is Death Note.
I've heard good things about Death Note. I'll have to check it out sometime.
It's a really good show, and it's really suspenseful.
I love suspenseful shows! I'll definitely check it out.
You're welcome to come over and watch it with me sometime.
That sounds like fun! I'd love to do that.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
